segments.text: I'm growing increasingly concerned by the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That two-step stool looks incredibly unstable right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it tilting backward, just slightly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, his balance must be very precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he could easily tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart actually jumps a bit when I imagine him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could hurt himself badly on the counter or the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And with the floor potentially wet from the overflowing sink...
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That would only make a fall much more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn him to be more careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister seems to be oblivious to the danger too, just focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation feels like an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope someone intervenes before he loses his footing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s hard to watch such a risky maneuver.
segments.speaker: PAR
